validations.message:
Recommended property `description` is missing from `IndividualFacilityUse`.

A full example looks like this:

```
"description": "An fast paced game that incorporates netball, handball and football."
```

Recommended property `image` is missing from `IndividualFacilityUse`.

A full example looks like this:

```
"image": [
  {
    "thumbnail": "http://example.com/static/image/speedball_thumbnail.jpg",
    "@type": "ImageObject",
    "url": "http://example.com/static/image/speedball_large.jpg"
  }
]
```
Recommended property `hoursAvailable` is missing from `IndividualFacilityUse`.

Recommended property `description` is missing from `FacilityUse`.

A full example looks like this:

```

```

Recommended property `offers` is missing from `FacilityUse`.

A full example looks like this:

```
"offers": {
  "@type": "Offer",

}
```

A full example looks like this:

body.name: The 'payment' property of the 'Order' is absent when it is expected to be provided.
body.description: Orders with prepayment must have nonzero price.
